ingredients.item: 400g can essential Waitrose Cannellini Beans, drained and rinsed
2x70g pack essential Waitrose British Wafer Thin Roast Chicken, shredded
150g frozen essential Waitrose Extra Fine Whole Green Beans

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large pan and gently fry the onion for 3â€“4 minutes.
Blend the stock cube with 800ml boiling water and add to the pan with the tomatoes, cannellini beans, pasta and chicken.
Bring to the boil, then cover, reduce the heat and simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally
